title: Before yall get up in arms about that leak, remember that we still have a week to go.
body:
The leaker said there would be a champion released in 7.12. 7.12 pbe is up next week, they usually do a reveal before the champ goes into pbe, so this champion would need to be revealed within the next 7 days or the leaks are very likely false.
This is one that essentially controls the whole leak. riot shouldn't postpone at this point.
